result.eng: The father from whom he got that habit.
result.ga: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.orig: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.html: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.
result.ponchtml: An t-aṫair ónar ṫóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.

result.eng: We used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.
result.ga: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na Life
result.orig: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na Life
result.html: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na LifeWe used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireaċt ar ḃruaċa na LifeWe used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.

result.eng: It was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ga: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.orig: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.html: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradhIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ponchtml: B'iad na Normannaiġ a ṫosaiġ an nós féasóg a ḃearraḋ agus gruaig a ġearraḋIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.

result.ga: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe
result.orig: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe
result.html: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoitheShe left like the wind.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ sí ar nós na gaoiṫeShe left like the wind.

result.eng: They act as if they owned the place.
result.ga: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áit
result.orig: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áit
result.html: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áitThey act as if they owned the place.
result.ponchtml: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áitThey act as if they owned the place.

result.eng: I am sweating like a pig.
result.ga: Tá mé ag cur allais ar nós na muice
result.orig: Tá mé ag cur allais ar nós na muice
result.html: Tá mé ag cur allais ar nós na muiceI am sweating like a pig.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag cur allais ar nós na muiceI am sweating like a pig.

result.eng: They live on healthy food such as fish and vegetables.
result.ga: Tá siad ag maireachtáil ar bhia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraí
result.orig: Tá siad ag maireachtáil ar bhia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraí
result.html: Tá siad ag maireachtáil ar bhia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraíThey live on healthy food such as fish and vegetables.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag maireaċtáil ar ḃia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraíThey live on healthy food such as fish and vegetables.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne

result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
